author: Anya Zoledziowski, Natasha Grzincic
title: Coronavirus Updates Canada: Trump Wants to Reopen the US-Canada Border Soon
description: US: coronavirus epicentre. Canada: flattening the curve. Will the border open soon? Unlikely.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
U.S. President Donald Trump wants to reopen the Canada-U.S. border soon, even though Canada is still weeks away from easing physical distancing measures that have helped slow the growth of the novel coronaviru… [+4144 chars]
